screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .red file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.54
screenshot.caption: RED file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.54

description: The Red programming language was introduced in 2011 and designed to improve upon the Rebol programming language. Nenad Rakočević developed Red to be a full-stack language where a developer could create the front-end and back-end of software.
NOTE: While RED files store Red source code, .REDS files contain a low-level dialect of the Red programming language, known as Red/System.

images.caption: RED file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.54
